metadata.description:
WATCHING TV
Written by DEEGAN & Eldar Zey
Produced by Eldar Zey & DEEGAN
Album Art by DEEGAN

The aliens are looking down on our species. 
Wondering how we let the beautiful Earth around us - rot away. 
While we surf through different blue light images, casting from various screens, the air gets dirtier and the water rises. 
Don't worry. 
The screens will tell us what to do. 
They tell us what to do every day. 

Lyrics:
I’m making it work
I’m making it work
Oh nah nah
I pray for the worst 
I pray for the worst
Oh nah nah
I’m making you sure 
I’m making you sure
Oh nah nah
That all of our problems be obsolete coming the first 
Chop it up makin' it burst
Prayin' up all on my knees
Anyone listening to me?
Nah nah
Mama be telling me, "Please, (you're) supposed to be making them G's"
Following all of my dreams
I could be making the cheese
Supposed to be making them Gs
Supposed to be catching them Zs
Oh no

I failed to mention 
I got my blessings
Throw out my wishes 
And learned all my lessons 
Smoke all my pressure 
Stand with my chest up
Oh 
My night alone

I spend it watching TV
Hoping that you see me
I know you withchyo friends right now 
Working it out like I know you do
And if you meet me
Somewhere where the trees breath 
We could get high in the morn'
In the summer time
metadata.name: WATCHING TV #1
metadata.title: WATCHING TV
